alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 7:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Isolated to widely scattered thunderstorms will impact portions of Beaverhead County through 900 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms developing across Beaverhead County with additional thunderstorms moving north from Idaho, all generally moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Lima, Jackson, Monida, Wisdom, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Bannack, Snowline, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building if thunder is heard and or lightning is observed.
